summary: Contoso Wireless offers reliable and fast internet packages with speeds ranging from 10 Mbps to 500 Mbps. The pricing is based on the speed of the connection and length of the contract, with free installation and 24/7 technical support included. The company takes security seriously, employing industry standard encryption protocols, firewalls, and antivirus software on all servers. They also provide 24/7 customer service and technical support in case of any issues or questions.
